nombre_evento: Salon des services à la personne 2025
descripcion: La feria de los servicios a la personaos permite descubrir y comparar todas las soluciones y profesionales que podéis necesitar. Os ayudará a encontrar todas las respuestas a vuestras preguntas, encontrar el suministrador de servicios que buscabais, obtener rebajas de precios, participar en actividades, y eventualmente encontrar un trabajo.

nombre_evento: World Leadership and Management International Conference on Strategies for Achieving Success 2025 (WLIC)
descripcion: The World Leadership and Management International Conference on "Strategies for Achieving Success" will takeplace on April 14th - 25th, 2025 Quebec - Canada in the historic city of Quebec, Canada. Whether you are looking toput a spotlight on your research and present it to an international community of peers or would like to catch up onthe latest trends in the field, we encourage you to start planning your trip. This is a unique opportunity to haveyour paper published in prestigious indexed journals as well as to get inspiration for your next research project.The World Leadership and Management International Conference is a truly international leadership conference.

India Med Expo is biggest medical exhibition & conference from last 15 years happening in India. This exhibition provides the best opportunities to cover the enormous Indian healthcare market as well as considering the special potential of the big metropolitan areas with its growing demand and rising investments in the public & private healthcare sector in India.India Med Expo is an annually and specialized show for Medical, Surgical, Hospitals, Diagnostics and other Healthcare Industries. The exhibition brings together healthcare leaders from a variety of disciplines to collaborate and learn
